name: tm09
effect: Teaches Bullet Seed to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Venoshock to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III: Bullet Seed Gen II: Psych Up Gen I: Take Down)

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user forcefully shoots seeds at the foe. Two to five seeds are shot in rapid succession.
flavor_text.platinum: The user forcefully shoots seeds at the foe. Two to five seeds are shot in rapid succession.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user forcefully shoots seeds at the foe. Two to five seeds are shot in rapid succession.
